financial services banking and healthcare domain as JavaJ2EE developer Strong background of working knowledge in all the phases of software development life cycle with strong analytical programming skills and having solid functional experience in the development implementation and the maintenance of complex JavaJ2EE based systems Extensive experience in AGILE Methodology and seeking an System and Regression testing Used Firebug and Send Http Tool to inspect edit and monitor CSS HTML5 JavaScript and requests in any web page Extensively used XML and JSON Parser Worked with Eclipse IDE and IntelliJ Extensive experienced with Application servers and Web servers Oracle Web logic 103 IBM Web Sphere 5x and Tomcat 5x Strong hands on experience in implementing Design patterns like MVC Singleton Data Access Object DTO DAO Session Faade Flyweight Delegate and Factory Patterns Experience in writting services to store retrieve and delete user records from the MongoDB for the POSTMAN Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience JAVA WEB SERVICESSOA DEVELOPER AMERICAN EXPRESS Phoenix AZ July 2018 to April 2019 RESPONSIBILITIES As a developer ensured business requirements are correctly translated into functional requirements design specifications and specifically source code Worked with PMs to break down work effort and establish deliverables for the project Experienced with retrospectives Sprint planning and all agile methodologies Developed a code for Web services SOAP REST using XML JSON and used SOAP UI tool for testing the services Written necessary EJB components to parse process the XML messages to the next layer establish the database connection communicate with database handle the Exceptions Errors and log the different levels of messages Developed EJB Session Bean for implementing business logic Expertise Experienced in JUnit Test case using JUnit Mockito and PowerMock for private variables Worked with front end developers in the process of defining RESTFUL APIs Involved in configuration and deployments of application on local JBoss Server Maintain GIT branches during project development conduct merge and use MAVEN for building and deploying the applications using IBM Websphere Experienced in using POSTMAN to interact with APIs setting up complex HTTP request and reading response Called the Restful web service calls for POST PUT DELETE and GET methods Performed Web Services testing using our own built XML and JSON parser Experienced and implemented architecture patterns like Singleton and Factory patterns Monitored logs using Splunk Tool debug the issues Prepared Unit test case using JUnit and used Jenkins for continuous integration testing Managed team of four coworker on five separate projects ensuring projects were completed on time Practitioner experience in UI development using Angular 20 Implemented AngularJS Controllers to maintain each view data Developed AngularJS components such as controllers Services filters and models Used AngularJS Http Request to read data from web servers and process JSON data to render in the UI ENVIRONMENT Core Java J2EE EJB Web service REST SOAP April 2016 to May 2018 RESPONSIBILITIES Involved in various phases of Software Development Life cycle SDLC of the application for requirement gathering design analysis and code development Worked on core java concepts like Collections Multithreading and Exception Handling for writing the backend APIS Used JAXRS REST for producing web services and involved in writing programs to consume the web services using SOA framework Implemented Web Services to integrate between different applications internal and third party components using RESTFUL services Worked on advance REST client plugin to run the REST API on local host JBoss Server Integrated testing framework using SOAP UI tool for testing exposed web services Involved in defining build process with MAVEN and customizing through CI builds using Jenkins Built a custom crossplatform architecture using Java Spring CoreMVC and Hibernate Implemented MVC architecture using JSP Spring and Hibernate and used Spring Framework to initialize managed beans and services Involved in development of Agent Verification System using Spring MVC framework Used Spring Inheritance to develop beans from already developed parent beans Used Spring AOP for logging auditing transaction management to distinguish business logic from the cross cutting concerns Used Spring Security for Authentication and Authorization of the application Designed MVC architecture and Front control design pattern using Spring MVC Framework for Presentation tier and also written code for the using Spring MVC Framework for Presentation layer and Spring dependency injection Used XML parser APIs such as JAXP and JAXB in the web services request response data marshalling as well as unmarshalling process Involved in defining build process with Maven scripts and customizing through CI builds using Jenkins Mostly used JIRA to update the JIRA ticket as the work progresses As a member of development team will be working with architects other developers support feasibility analysis both at the frontend and backend level and documenting requirements Participated in code review and peer review meetings for the design docs Developed and debugged the application using Eclipse IDE Performed Unit testing Integration Testing and generating of test cases for web applications using JUnit and documented web applications and code Responsible for designing Rich user Interface Applications using JavaScript CSS HTML and AJAX Wrote SQL Queries and stored procedures using SQL queries constraints views ExportImport and connected database using JDBC API Used ANT as build tool and developed build file for compiling the code of creating WAR files Analyzed the performance of the application using JMeter Responsible for setting up stagepreprod environments deploying the services into staging servers Worked with multiple projects and work stream concurrently Supported the Production Team members in the development and testing of production Implementation
